How can i download my driving license?
Click on the Ecitizen link which would directly you to your portfolio, enter you credential you are good to go.
How can i download my KRA PIN?
Click on the KRA image to login to your KRA account, on your account loyout click on kra form
How can our youth group access tender?
Click on the AGPO image to create an account which will direct you to your account to access procurement opportunities just login and you will be there.
How can i file my tax return online?
Click on the KRA image which will redirect you to your KRA account
how can download my driving license?
Click on the E-Citizen link which will direct you to your account
I you looking for a job?Apply for a government job and get updates when you get a chance.
Click on Public Service Commission link to get a chance today for a government job.
